snippet.title: Burn After Reading Movie Review By Scene-Stealers.com
snippet.description:
Burn After Reading Movie Review By Scene-Stealers.com
Toegevoegd door Scene-Stealers.com 5 jaren geleden
Fresh off of their Best Picture winner "No Country for Old Men," Joel and Ethan Coen return to the screen with a pitch-black comedy called "Burn After Reading," starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Tilda Swinton, John Malkovich, Richard Jenkins, and the lynchpin of the whole movie, Frances McDormand. Are the Coen brothers up to their old tricks again, putting desperate characters through their bizarre twisted rollercoaster ride? Scene-Stealers mogul Eric Melin and guest host Kevin Quinn from KRBZ 96.5 the buzz have the scoop in this on-camera movie review of "Burn After Reading," featuring clips from the movie! Here's a first-look movie review of "Burn After Reading," filmed moments after the credits rolled in the movie theater.
341 views

snippet.title: BURN AFTER READING MOVIE TRAILER & REVIEW
snippet.description:
BURN AFTER READING MOVIE TRAILER & REVIEW
Toegevoegd door TrailerHits.com 5 jaren geleden
FOR MORE VIDEOS GO TO WWW.TRAILERHITS.COM/TRAILERHITS Trailer Hits is the first and only show that reviews the film only by the trailer. "Burn After Reading" SYNOPSIS A dark spy–comedy from Academy Award winners Joel and Ethan Coen ("No Country for Old Men"). An ousted CIA official‘s (John Malkovich) memoir accidentally falls into the hands of two ‘unwise‘ gym employees (Brad Pitt and Frances McDormand) who are intent on exploiting their find.
